item.title: Apple says most US-bound iPhones no longer made in China as tariffs bite - BBC
item.description:
1. Apple says most US-bound iPhones no longer made in China as tariffs bite  BBC
  2. Apple to Source Billions of US-Made Chips in Supply Chain Shift  Yahoo Finance
  3. Apple moving to make most iPhones for US in India rather than China, source says  Reuters
  4. Apple CEO Tim Cook says tariffs to add $900M in costs in Q3, but future uncertain  TechCrunch
  5. Apple says most iPhones sold in US will be from India  DW
